text: The #DrugWar began in #ElPaso 1915 “Tree of Life” Eli Lilly just did his dissertation on #Cannabis ~ Jim Crow the man called it Marijuana a dangerous drug ~ Nixon finds Cannabis stops #Cancer we got Reagan & @POTUS @SenateDems @DEAHQ ~ We need fundamental changes #TexasWarOnWomen https://t.co/PsrIqPP5yN
